subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Joe Drape and Melissa Hoppert weigh in on some of the contenders for the 141st Kentucky Derby, which is set to be run May 2.
snippet: Joe Drape and Melissa Hoppert weigh in on some of the contenders for the 141st Kentucky Derby, which is set to be run May 2.
